install.name: aiRedirectWww
install.author: Alex Dobrin
install.copyright: Copyright (C)2012 Alex Dobrin. All rights reserved.
install.description: A plugin to redirect the page to the domain with or without www.

param.name: moved_redirect
param.label: Type of redirect
param.description: Select the type of redirect to use.

param.name: check_localhost
param.label: Check localhost
param.description: Redirect the page only if the page is not accessed through localhost.

param.name: with_www
param.label: Redirect to WWW
param.description: Redirect the page to the domain with wwww.

param.name: redirect_site
param.label: Redirect
param.description: Select when to redirect the page.

param.name: cookie_lifetime
param.label: Cookie life time
param.description: Number of seconds the value of noaiwww ( deactivate the plugin ) is remembered in a cookie.
